Package it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionPanel
    The panel that groups the buttons needed to send an action
    ChatPanel
    Panel for the chat
    ChoicePanel
    The Choice Panel, the first screen that appears when opening the guy, connects to the server after inserting a username
    ClientMediator
    Mediator class for the GUI.
    EventPanel
    The event sub-panel of the gamepanel.
    GamePanel
    The main panel where you play the game and have lots of fun.
    GUI
    The main class of the GUI
    GUI.Waiting
    Worker that creates the game panel, asks to the server all the informations it needs and waits untill all the player have connected to start playing the game
    GUIHelper
    Utility class for the GUI, we put some static types in here that we may need at different times in different classes
    ItemLabel
    The label representing an Item in teh game
    ItemPanel
    The sub-panel holding the items
    MusicPanel
    Class to play the background music in loop and provide buttons to stop that terrifying sound adapted (and freely copied) from: http://www.developer.com/java/other/article.php/2173111/Java-Sound-Playing-Back-Audio-Files-using-Java.htm
    PlayerPanel
    The panel which contains the information about the player's character, with buttons to perform actions and items available for use or discard.
    SectorLabel
    The Label representing a SectorLabel
    SpaceshipPanel
    The sub-panel containing the spaceship map
